id.description: The unique identifier for this cost rate entry.

parent_id.description: The parent identifier if this cost rate is a child entry.

amount.description: The cost rate amount associated with this data entry.

start_date.description: The start date from which the cost rate is valid. Only applicable for intervals.

end_date.description: The end date for which the cost rate is valid. Only applicable for intervals.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when this cost rate entry was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp for the last update made to this cost rate entry.
